longBusinessSummary: Penn Bancshares, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Pennsville National Bank that provides various banking services in Salem County, New Jersey. The company accepts various deposit products, including checking, savings, and money market accounts; certificates of deposit; individual retirement accounts; and education savings accounts. It also offers mortgage and home equity, auto, commercial, and construction loans, as well as Visa cards. In addition, the company provides trust and estate services, Internet and phone banking, automatic teller machine, safe deposit boxes, money orders, wire transfers, and night depository services. It operates offices in Pennsville, Elmer, Carney's Point, Pedricktown, and Woodstown. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Pennsville, New Jersey.
